mapper.select: SELECT LODGing_no user_no lodging_city lodging_post_no lodging_address lodging_address_rest lodging_description lodging_imm_approval lodging_max_guest lodging_image lodging_name lodging_bedroom lodging_bathroom lodging_singlebed lodging_doublebed lodging_view_count lodging_review_count lodging_review_average lodging_cleanness lodging_communication lodging_check_in lodging_accuracy lodging_location lodging_value lodging_status lodging_type_code lodging_lat lodging_lNG FROM WHERE

SELECT lodging_no user_no lodging_city lodging_post_no lodging_address lodging_address_rest lodging_description lodging_imm_approval lodging_max_guest lodging_image lodging_name lodging_bedroom lodging_bathroom lodging_singlebed lodging_doublebed lodging_view_count lodging_review_count lodging_review_average lodging_cleanness lodging_communication lodging_check_in lodging_accuracy lodging_location lodging_value lodging_status lodging_type_code lodging_lat lodging_lng FROM thxtay_lodging WHERE user_no=#{value}
